description: Thousands of last-minute challenges to voters’ mail ballot applications, along with baseless claims by former President Donald Trump, are adding pressure on Pennsylvania county officials.
title: Thousands of Pennsylvania voters have had their mail ballot applications challenged

description: Robert F. Kennedy, Jr.’s claims about fluoride in the drinking water are linked to Cold War conspiracy theories about the substance.
title: No more fluoride in the water? RFK Jr. wants that and Trump says it 'sounds OK'

description: Green eggs and ham? Even toddlers know when an event appears to be impossible, not just improbable.
title: Impossible, you say? Try asking a toddler

description: If reelected, Trump would only be the second president to serve non-consecutive terms after Grover Cleveland in the late 1800s. Here's a look at how that happened — and who else has tried.
title: Trump is hoping to win non-consecutive terms. Only one president has done it
